name: Tovi Minisite [Remix]
description:
This is a remixed version of the contact card minisite from Figma Community. It was originally started by Rogie.
---
這是一個個人介紹卡，或者個人介紹小網站的 Remix。最初是由 Rogie 发起。

I use VS Code as a reference, and made a minimalist version with multiple themes.
---
介面參考了 Visual Studio Code，不過做了一些簡化。同時，還設計了多套顏色主題，在原型模式下可以進行切換。

FYI: You can play with the prototype right on this page.
---
你可以直接在這個頁面來玩這個原型。
